title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with large language models locally. Provides a CLI and REST API for pulling, running, and managing models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client library for Ollama. Stream chat, generate text, and manage models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama. Chat, generate embeddings, pull models, list tags with a simple Pythonic interface.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama for chat, LLM, and embeddings in LangChain apps.

title: ollama-webui (Ollama-WebUI)
summary: Open-source web UI for Ollama with chat interface, model management, and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama. Generate text, chat, pull models, and stream responses in JVM applications.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama. Simple wrapper to chat and generate text with local models.

title: ollama-cli (community)
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama written in Rust. Syntax highlighting, conversation history, and fuzzy model search.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings Ollama models into GitHub Copilot chat or standalone sidebar.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama. Lightweight bindings for chat and generate endpoints.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama. Async client with tokio, supports chat, generate, and embeddings.

title: ollama-nextjs-chat
summary: Next.js starter template that streams Ollama chat completions via the ollama-js client.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration for Ollama. Use local models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# .NET client for Ollama. Chat and generate text in .NET 6+ applications.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package for Ollama. Chat and generate completions in mobile or desktop Flutter apps.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node that adds Ollama chat and generate actions to no-code workflows.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir wrapper for Ollama. GenServer-based client with streaming for Phoenix/LiveView apps.

title: ollama-rustlang (community)
summary: Alternative Rust client with built-in retry, backoff, and tracing support for Ollama.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stack with Ollama, WebUI, and GPU support for quick local deployment.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node selectors and autoscaling.
